title: Nilave Naanum Lyrics Yuvan Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singers: Naresh Iyer, Padmapriya
Lyrics: Vivega
Song: Nilave Naanum
Movie: Yuvan
Music by : Joshua Sridhar

Sari edhu, ingu thavaredhu
Ingu puriya koodumo
Ilamaye dhinam kulapudhe
idhu enna maayamo

Nilave Naanum neethaana ?
Dhinamum valiyil thaeivena..
Pogum paadhai sarithaana
Pen udal enraal oru mayakkam

Vayadhe uyirai vaangathe
Arumbu paruvam thaangaathe
Ninaivin sumaigal o-yaadhe
En manadhellam oru kulappam

Dhinam kodi aasai mulaikudhe
Oru dhinusaai ennaku valikudhe
En peyare yenno marakudhe
Thadumaatrame..

Moondre nodiyil pournami
Oru moonram pirayaai ilaithadhe
Koodadhenru moolai solla
Vayadhe ketkaamal adhaye seiyum

Nilave Naanum neethaana ?
Dhinamum valiyil thaeivena..
Pogum paadhai sarithaana
Pen udal enraal oru mayakkam

Vayadhe uyirai vaangathe
Arumbu paruvam thaangaathe
Ninaivin sumaigal o-yaadhe
En manadhellam oru kulappam

Edhayum edhayum arindhu paarthuvida
Idhayam aasayil yaenguthe
Avalai paarthadhum arivu odi poi
porvai pothi thoongudhe

Vaazhai pola minnum vizhiyum
avvan idhai kaattum kanna kuliyum
Uyir parakka parakka thavika thavika
rasikiren inikum kaayame ..( Nilave Naanum neethaana...)

Yedhire theriyum vaanavil athanai
Viralgal theenda kooduma
Thaeneer koppaiyil udhadu modhuvadhu
Mutham endru aaguma
Paaravayaale aval alaika
en paruva naanangal vizhika

Oru nodiyil nodiyil udaindhu naanum vilukiren
uyirin imisaye...

Nilave Naanum neethaana .....
Dhinamum valiyil thaeivena..
Pogum paadhai sarithaana
Pen udal enraal oru mayakkam

Vayadhe uyirai vaangathe
Arumbu paruvam thaangaathe
Ninaivin sumaigal o-yaadhe
En manadhellam oru kulappam

Dhinam kodi aasai mulaikudhe
Oru dhinusaai ennaku valikudhe
En peyare yenno marakudhe
Thadumaatrame..

Moondre nodiyil pournami
Oru moonram pirayaai ilaithadhe
Koodadhenru moolai solla
Vayadhe ketkaamal adhaye seiyum (Nilave Naanum neethaana..)
